title: Calories in Paneer
meta_description: Discover calories in paneer per 100g, including protein, fat, carbs, and full nutrition breakdown for this Indian cheese.
assumptions: Standard full-fat paneer (Indian cottage cheese), homemade from whole milk, unsalted, firm texture.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by milk type, fat content, brand, and preparation method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100g of paneer provides ~265 kcal and ~18g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp oil for frying per 100g

faqs.a: About 265 kcal for standard full-fat paneer.
Yes, ~18.3g protein per 100g, making it great for vegetarians.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in paneer?
faqs.a: Around 20.8g total fat per 100g, mostly saturated.
Very low, only ~1.2g carbs and 0g fiber per 100g.
Lower calories (~165 kcal per 100g) but less creamy texture.
